name: Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D
description:
Do you want to feel the speed of freefall and ride the wind? Check Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D
– great app for all, who love extreme sports simulators!
Put on your wing suit and leap from the mountain top – tumble and whirl, hurtle through the sky and perform different tricks and stunts! Become a real proximity flying pro with Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D!
Enjoy the atmosphere of the most dangerous adrenaline sport on the planet - wingsuiting! Try to fly like a bat as close to the cliff as possible for maximum points.... and try not to die. Feel as a real athlete – fly down, tumble hurtle, whirl and get fun! But don’t forget to use a parachute!
Rush through the sky and earn points to unlock new types of wing suit and new heights to jump from! Complete all tasks and become the world champion of this bright and dangerous sport!
Try two different game modes – free flight mode and tournament mode, and show the best results at both!
Fly over the valleys, plains and hills, feel the wind and have fun with Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D!
Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D features:
• Two game modes
• Different tricks and stunts to perform
• For all the fans of skydiving
• Unlockable locations
• Picturesque views
Feel the pumping of adrenaline in your veins, try the skydiving right now! Download Wingsuit Sky Dive 3D and be a real athlete without leaving your room!
